high_descs: go the left side of the desk
pick up the disk from the desk
take the disk to the lamp
anns.task_desc: look at the disk under the lamp

high_descs: turn to the right and move to the dresser that is to the left of the end of the bed
pick up the CD that is on the left side of the dresser
move slightly to the left to face the lamp in the left corner of the dresser
anns.task_desc: examine a CD by the light of the lamp on the dresser

high_descs: go forward and turn right and then move forward
turn left and move forward and then turn right
turn left and move forward and then turn right and face the desk
pick up the cd and then turn left and then turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: move forward to the desk and pick up the cd and then turn on the lamp.
